original_text: You rob people. You murder people. You have sex with someone else's wife or husband. You tell lies in court when you have promised to tell the truth. You offer sacrifices to the false god, Baal. You serve other gods that you never knew before.
korean_text: 너희가 도둑질하며 살인하며 간음하며 거짓 맹세하며 바알에게 분향하며 너희가 알지 못하는 다른 신들을 따르면서

sentences.original_text: You have sex with someone else's wife or husband.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 사람의 아내나 남편과 성관계를 가집니다.

sentences.original_text: when you have promised to tell the truth.
You offer sacrifices to the false god, Baal.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 거짓 신 바알에게 제물을 바칩니다.
